product.title: Modular Digital Access Control Platform
product.subtitle: Comprehensive platform providing digital authorization at physical access points (turnstiles, locker locks, special room doors). Manage all your access points with a single mobile app.
product.whyOxyKeyPassDesc: Smart solution combining traditional access systems with modern technology

mobileApp.title: Mobile Application
mobileApp.description: Access from anywhere with iOS and Android app

modules.title: System Components
modules.subtitle: OxyKeyPass is a modular system consisting of 5 core components. Each component serves a different function and together provides secure access control.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App
mobileApp.description: iOS and Android app for users to read QR codes and access. Everyone can use it easily with a simple interface.

adminPanels.title: Company Admin Panel
adminPanels.description: Panel where each company manages its own on-premise database. Manage users, devices and permissions on your own computer.

deviceIntegration.title: Device Integration
deviceIntegration.description: Integration with physical devices such as turnstiles, door locks, locker locks. Controlled with Raspberry Pi.

generalApi.title: General API
generalApi.description: Central authentication system. Recognizes users and directs them to the right company. The heart of the entire system.

companyApi.title: Company API
companyApi.description: Authorization system running on each company's own computer. Data is stored locally, security is maximum.

workflow.title: Coordination
workflow.description: The process of 5 components working together. QR code reading, authentication, authorization and device control.

benefits.title: Our Advantages
benefits.subtitle: Take your business to the next level with OxyKeyPass

testimonials.title: Customer Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: What do businesses using OxyKeyPass say?

review1.name: Ahmet YÄ±lmaz
review1.content: We significantly increased our security level thanks to OxyKeyPass. The installation was very easy and our staff quickly adapted.

review2.name: Elif Demir
review2.content: We use OxyKeyPass for patient and staff security in our hospital. It's a very reliable and user-friendly system.

review3.name: Mehmet Kaya
review3.content: We chose OxyKeyPass for student access tracking at our school. It's both secure and practical.

q1.question: Can I integrate OxyKeyPass with my existing turnstile system?
q1.answer: Yes, OxyKeyPass easily integrates with your existing turnstile systems. Only a motherboard replacement will be sufficient.

q2.question: Can the system work offline?
q2.answer: Yes, OxyKeyPass can work in hybrid mode. Basic access operations continue even without internet connection.

q3.question: How many users does it support?
q3.answer: OxyKeyPass has unlimited user capacity. It scales according to your needs.

q4.question: How is data security ensured?
q4.answer: Data security is guaranteed with 256-bit SSL encryption, ISO 27001 certification and KVKK/GDPR compliance.

q5.question: How long does installation take?
q5.answer: Basic installation is completed in 5 minutes. 1-2 days is sufficient for comprehensive integrations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Make secure access in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Scan QR Code
step1.description: Point your phone's camera at the QR code on the door. The app automatically reads the code.

step2.title: Authorization Check
step2.description: The system verifies your identity and checks your authorization to pass through this door.

step3.title: Door Opens
step3.description: If you have permission, the door opens instantly. The access is recorded and you are notified.
